reviews.review:
I bought HL2 when it came out. Still the best game I bought since. 

The graphics still hold up, the physics are great and somehow the game is still fun to replay after all these years. 

Still waiting for HL3
its cool, im to lazy to wright it in detail, but im sure you can find a detailed one.
다섯손가락 안에 꼽는 게임 중 하나. 생각날 때 다운받아서 한다. 언제 플레이해도 이만한 게임이 없다. 스팀을 깔고 본격적으로 게임을 즐겨보고 싶다면 하프라이프 부터.
this game chews ass and kicks gum

I never played the Half Life games until recently so i am completely unbiased when i say that i think Half Life 2 has aged very well.

The only issue i did have with it was that the next path to take wasn't always obvious and i'd often find myself completing segments and wandering around for a couple minutes wondering "Ok, but what now?"
10/10 papa, si no lo jugas sos alto gil.
UNO DE LOS MEJORES Y MÁS REVOLUCIONARIOS JUEGOS DE LA HISTORIA, no diré nada más.
This game is the most overrated bullshit I've ever played. Yeah the physics were nice and still are but everything else is just not fun. I feel no joy in playing this game

ik vind de story line ik vind die goed gemaakt

Mało autorska gra. Cały pomysł na siebie ma z Half Life 1, a przedmioty i generalnie wszystko przekopiowane z Garry's Mod'a. Pomijając kwestię kradzieży i braku oryginalności gry to jest ona jak Half Life 1, ale lepszy.
Que mierda porque una actualizacion cada maldita vez que se le cambia el idioma al puto juego
Absorbing game, definitely a must play if you’ve never played any source games.
The right man in the wrong place can make all the difference.

Incredible; with the release of Half Life Alyx just around a year ago, this game is still a classic and has by no means died. With that being said, unfortunately Half Life Alyx is honestly a mere shadow of the Half Life series. The implementation of Virtual Reality was a great idea, but it is NOT consumer ready. The Valve Index, is not affordable for commercial use right now. Most people don't have an incredible Gaming PC with a very high end graphics card, and on top of that, the valve index costs roughly 1000$ on top of that, plus the game itself. With how long everyone has waited for HL3, HLA was doomed to fail; it was such a challenge to Valve to have HLA live up to the impossible expectation of Half Life 3. Still, for my money, I would choose Half Life 2.

Oynayıp oynayabileceğiniz en iyi hikaye evrenlerinden biri. Eğer oynayacaksanız ilk oyunun remastered hali ile başlayıp daha sonra portal oyunlarını bitirin. Aynı evrende geçen bu oyunlar sizleri sonu olmayan gizemlere sürüklüyor

Half life pero mejor

En cuestión Gráfica supera a half life 1 por mucho y el tema físicas también, en diseño de niveles hay mas variedad debido que no estamos en las instalaciones de black mesa estamos en toda una ciudad con carreteras, prisiones canales, etc. Lo único malo que podría decir son las armas debido que la mayoría son un re-skin que nuevas, pero en general un excelente juego

The game is pretty good, its a good FPS, much better than Half Life 1,some issues are I hate the characters they are very annoying and not interesting, the parts where you have to go through story is annoying, the parts where you are with Alyx are terrible. The parts where you are alone are very good. The last levels the big tower that I can not sound out is very boring and not good it looks cool but is not a good part. This game is good in general much better than the prior games in terms of game play especially. I wish they were for a more American 1930s buildings setting but I am used to Eastern Bloc "generic term because each nation had their own kind of buildings yet all shared traits" buildings so it is not special to me, so that may be why I would rather have the 1930s skyscrapers that are akin to American big cities like in Half Life 2 Beta.

наверное самая странная игра на моей памяти, раньше о ней только слышал и решил сыграть только в 21-м году, и то, как-то не хотелось в нее играть, а когда заходил, то выходить не хотелось пока не доходил до места, где не понимал как пройти...
神作，水面效果放到现在来看依然不过时
Хедкраба мне в дупу, вот это игра...

It's Half life 2


What hasn't been said about it already?
有创意但是并不好玩，关卡设计，武器设计，一些环境的利用都是顶级的创意和应用，但是打怪很枯燥，线性剧情中的敌人并没有很好ai指引，战斗大致可分为，和人类对射，和丧尸肉搏，和机甲互磕，剧情演出肯定是一流的，偶尔还有gman的小彩蛋也很有趣，但是故事没讲完，应该是和三代有衔接的。
There's a reason why everyone wants a sequel

Alongside Halo 2, one of the only singleplayer FPS experiences from 2004 that are just as enjoyable to play now as they were when they were released. If you're a fan of FPS games, all of the Half Life 2 content in The Orange Box is worth experiencing.
Half life 2 is a amazing game peroid
